page.title: 07Medical Provision.
page.content: Dr Karam and his medical team serve the whole of Unst.There are two surgeries: one at Baltasound from 9.30 -11.30 am (Monday to Friday) plus Wednesday afternoons from 2.30 pm;- the other is held at R.A.F. Saxa Vord from 2.00 - 3.00 pm Mondays and Fridays. An antinatal clinic is held in Baltasound on Tuesdays,Dr Karam's staff consist of two receptionists, two civilian nurses,three R.A.F. nurses and one cleaner.There is also one social worker and an ambulance on the island.What are the advantages of being an island G.P? People are generally healthy and friendly and Dr Karam enjoys job satisfaction in the soope offered by being his own boss. Disadvantages are few, the G.P.may feel isolated from the rest of the community at times , and there is an 18month waiting list for the locum.
